column5: This Master's programme emphasises hands-on hardware and software development of mobile robotic solutions for the energy, transport, and logistics sectors as well as the project-based design of swarm and soft robotic technologies which are key for surveillance, healthcare as well as dexterous manipulation in the food and manufacturing industries.Robotics is an interdisciplinary and highly dynamic field ranging from the design of mechanical and electronic components to the development of software used to sense the environment and planning robot motions to control their execution.
